lines.text: What would I have to give you for one little kiss?
Chloroform.
The thing you wanna avoid is outlasting everybody. Can you remember that?
Just relax and follow my lead.
Yeah. Right off a cliff.
Mind if I smoke?
I don't care if you burn.
What a prince.
[On stage during a power outage]
Well... alone in the dark with thousands of men. There is a God after all!

[Appearing on stage late]
So sorry.
[British accent]
A little trouble over the channel you know, old pip.
Really.
Righto. We were halfway to Belgium when we ran out of... gas, I believe you call it.
That's funny. You don't look like you'd ever run out of gas.
Are you trying to get into my flak suit, honey?
I'm just trying to debrief you. So a plane without any gas. What did you do?
Do?
Yeah. Do. You know to keep up morale and all that.

Well... well... my co-pilot... lovely young boy but terrified, half out of his wits. You know, nervous. Terrified. I said to him, "This one's going to take a long... hard... pull." So I did! For two hours!
Two hours alone with you? That boy deserves a purple heart.
Well, it was purple, alright, but I don't think it was his heart!
[Performing a skit for a television show]
You know, that son of ours is really something.
Why? What happened?
While I'm tucking him in bed last night, he suddenly says to me, "Mommy, is kissing dirty?"
Yeah? What'd you tell him?
I said to him, "Darling, sex between two people can be a beautiful thing."
Oh, yeah.
"But between four people... fantastic!"
You're gonna kill him you fill his head full of this crap!
Such as what?
Such as "Don't study," "Everything comes easy," "Life's a big party."
Oh, well, sounds good to me.
Oh yeah? You got three daughters. Why don't you give them the benefit of your wisdom?
Because my wisdom is for a son. I got a closet full of baseball cards...
Don't break my heart!
Alright. How long's it now been - eight years Michael's dead?
You shut up!
No. You let me talk. Now enough is enough here. That boy needs a father. He needs a man in his life - somebody he can talk to, somebody who can teach him, somebody who can show him.
What? How to screw the chorus girls?
Yeah, why not if he wants to... yeah, why not! That's life! Hey, I wish somebody was there to teach me how to kiss 'em, how to talk to 'em - how to jack off!
What did you say?
That's right, lady! Who's gonna tell him it's alright - that his thing won't fall off - his mother? Why don't you put a dress on him and forget about it?
I would, but then you'd probably make a pass at him!
[to the soldiers in Vietnam]
Shut the fuck up. It's Christmastime. I'm gonna sing you a little song.
America the land of the fee.
What? we're short... oh time. Two minutes time. Well, Dixie do you have any ideas of what we can do in two minutes?
Not unless your part rabbit.
You know...for an old broad, you're still pretty sexy.
How would you know?
Well, I think I'm getting excited.
Let me know when you're sure.
Hey, Dixie, they gave me a big suite upstairs.
Really?
Oh yeah. And I got a big king-size bed.
You wanna lie down, Eddie?
Is that an offer?
It's a recommendation.
Look at this. I'm 91 years old. 50 years I've been waiting for this chance. Dixie, please let's go upstairs.
What, to your room?
Yeah.
And then we get undressed?
Yeah.
And then we get into bed?
Yeah.
And then what?
